page.title: 10Employment in Ponteland
page.content: Of the few people it was possible to interview,all had a job either in Ponteland or within 8 or 9 miles.Most of the men were 'white collar' workers in a variety of occupations some of which involved a lot of travelling, such as {Sales Representatives }and { {Country Park Manager. }The others included a {Civil Servant,an Insurance {Broker,and an Office Worker. }The one manual worker was a {Plumber. } The women on the other hand mostly had part-time jobs starting and finishing at a greater variety of times.Many of them were involved in the {welfare }of people from children to old persons,either in hospitals, schools or homes.Other places of work were {shops,bank and hospital office.} Apart from the salesman and hospital administrator they all work with other people,reason for job satisfaction.
